name: Killer Station
summary: A Space Invaders-like game where you control a missile platform and shoot down "Killer Stations" while avoiding their missiles. The bad guys have "Barrier Satellites" and "Space Mines" to try to block your missiles from hitting them. Try your best to get all the killer stations to win the round and progress.
